acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should be able to fill in POJOs with raw type collection attributes and default values to Object
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldBeAbleToFillInPojosWithRawTypeCollectionAttributesAndDefaultValueToObject

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ReadOnlyRawFieldsPojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the collection should not be null or empty and each element should be of type java.lang.Object@5ce4c15a

Then the Map should not be null or empty and each element should have key of type java.lang.Object@6d54bb1=java.lang.Object@5f2cccc0 and value of type java.lang.Object@33a8ae90=java.lang.Object@1adac232
